# Visual Studio
.vs/
*.vs
*.suo
*.user

# Buid artifacts
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# Rider
.idea/

# User-specific files
*.DotSettings.user

# Files generated by Visual Studio
*.*.user
*.*.bak

# Nuget Packages
packages/

# Mac files
.DS_Store

# Environment files
.env

# Secrets
secrets.json
appsettings.Development.json

# Log files
logs/
*.log
